#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define gc getchar_unlocked
using namespace std;
int scan(){
	int n = 0;
    register int c;
    while((c=gc())<=' ');
    if(c=='-') return -scan();
    for(; c>' '; c=gc()) n=(n<<1)+(n<<3)+c-'0';
    return n;
}
int main(){
    int t,n,k,i;
    long long ans;
    t=scan();
    while(t--){
        n=scan(); k=scan();
        ans=1;
        if(k>n-k) k=n-k;
        for(i=1;i<=k;++i){
            ans *= (n-i+1);
            ans /= i;
        }
        cout << ans << '\n';
    }
	return 0;
}
